response:
Have you made sure you installed the addon correctly?

Single abilities go in `/plugins/ProjectKorra/Abilities`, but most ability packs and side plugins go in `/plugins/`. Check on the resource page to check where it should go.

if the addon is installed correctly, it's possible it might be outdated. Check the date on the latest release. If it's more than a few years old, chances are it won't work.

If you've checked both these things, please check the console on your server. If there is an error in there, please post that error here. This will help support pick out exactly what is the issue. You can find this within the `/logs/latest.log` file of your server.
